accounts.name: user
docs: The account that signs the transaction.

accounts.name: verifierAccount
docs: The Verifier Account stores the DON's public keys and other verification parameters.
This account must match the PDA derived from the verifier program.

accounts.name: accessController
docs: The Access Controller Account

accounts.name: configAccount
docs: The Config Account is a PDA derived from a signed report

accounts.name: verifierProgramId
docs: The Verifier Program ID specifies the target Chainlink Data Streams Verifier Program.

instructions.name: refreshPythLazerPrice
docs: IMPORTANT: we assume the tokens passed in to this ix are in the same order in which
they are found in the message payload. Thus, we rely on the client to do this work

accounts.name: user
docs: The account that signs the transaction.

accounts.name: oraclePrices
docs: Price entry will be reset if the corresponding mapping changes

accounts.name: oracleTwaps
docs: Twap entry will be reset if the corresponding mapping changes

accounts.name: MintsToScopeChains
docs: Map of mints to scope chain only valid for a given price feed

types.name: ChainlinkStandardPriceData
docs: Price data for standard Chainlink types (v3, v7, v8, v9)

types.name: ChainlinkXPriceData
docs: Price data for ChainlinkX type (v10)

fields.name: lpLiquidityTarget
docs: Liquidity target. If the Liquidity reach this amount, the fee reaches lp_min_discount_fee

fields.name: lpMaxFee
docs: Liquidity pool max fee

fields.name: lpMinFee
docs: SOL/mSOL Liquidity pool min fee

fields.name: treasuryCut
docs: Treasury cut

fields.name: slotsForStakeDelta
docs: set by admin, how much slots before the end of the epoch, stake-delta can start

fields.name: lastStakeDeltaEpoch
docs: Marks the start of stake-delta operations, meaning that if somebody starts a delayed-unstake ticket
after this var is set with epoch_num the ticket will have epoch_created = current_epoch+1
(the user must wait one more epoch, because their unstake-delta will be execute in this epoch)

fields.name: extraStakeDeltaRuns
docs: can be set by validator-manager-auth to allow a second run of stake-delta to stake late stakers in the last minute of the epoch
so we maximize user's rewards

fields.name: totalActiveBalance
docs: sum of all active lamports staked

fields.name: autoAddValidatorEnabled
docs: allow & auto-add validator when a user deposits a stake-account of a non-listed validator

fields.name: circulatingTicketCount
docs: count tickets for delayed-unstake

fields.name: circulatingTicketBalance
docs: total lamports amount of generated and not claimed yet tickets

fields.name: updatesTracker1h
docs: The sample tracker is a 64 bit number where each bit represents a point in time.

types.name: ReportDataV9RipcordFlag
docs: # Ripcord Flag
- `0` (false): Feed's data provider is OK. Fund's data provider and accuracy is as expected.
- `1` (true): Feed's data provider is flagging a pause. Data provider detected outliers,
deviated thresholds, or operational issues. **DO NOT consume NAV data when ripcord=1.**

types.name: ScopeChainError
docs: Errors that can be raised while creating or manipulating a scope chain

errors.name: IntegerOverflow
errors.msg: Integer overflow

errors.name: ConversionFailure
errors.msg: Conversion failure

errors.name: MathOverflow
errors.msg: Mathematical operation with overflow

errors.name: OutOfRangeIntegralConversion
errors.msg: Out of range integral conversion attempted

errors.name: UnexpectedAccount
errors.msg: Unexpected account in instruction

errors.name: PriceNotValid
errors.msg: Price is not valid

errors.name: AccountsAndTokenMismatch
errors.msg: The number of tokens is different from the number of received accounts

errors.name: BadTokenNb
errors.msg: The token index received is out of range

errors.name: BadTokenType
errors.msg: The token type received is invalid

errors.name: SwitchboardV2Error
errors.msg: There was an error with the Switchboard V2 retrieval

errors.name: InvalidAccountDiscriminator
errors.msg: Invalid account discriminator

errors.name: UnableToDeserializeAccount
errors.msg: Unable to deserialize account

errors.name: BadScopeChainOrPrices
errors.msg: Error while computing price with ScopeChain

errors.name: RefreshInCPI
errors.msg: Refresh price instruction called in a CPI

errors.name: RefreshWithUnexpectedIxs
errors.msg: Refresh price instruction preceded by unexpected ixs

errors.name: InvalidUpdateSequenceOrAccounts
errors.msg: Invalid update sequence or accounts

errors.name: UnableToDerivePDA
errors.msg: Unable to derive PDA address

errors.name: BadTimestamp
errors.msg: Invalid timestamp

errors.name: BadSlot
errors.msg: Invalid slot

errors.name: PriceAccountNotExpected
errors.msg: Received a price account when none is expected

errors.name: TwapSourceIndexOutOfRange
errors.msg: TWAP source index out of range

errors.name: TwapSampleTooFrequent
errors.msg: TWAP sample is too close to the previous one

errors.name: UnexpectedJlpConfiguration
errors.msg: Unexpected JLP configuration

errors.name: TwapNotEnoughSamplesInPeriod
errors.msg: Not enough price samples in period to compute TWAP

errors.name: EmptyTokenList
errors.msg: The provided token list to refresh is empty

errors.name: StakeFeeTooHigh
errors.msg: The stake pool fee is higher than the maximum allowed

errors.name: KTokenUnderlyingPriceNotValid
errors.msg: Cannot get a valid price for the tokens composing the Ktoken

errors.name: KTokenHoldingsCalculationError
errors.msg: Error while computing the Ktoken pool holdings

errors.name: CannotResizeAccount
errors.msg: Cannot resize the account we only allow it to grow in size

errors.name: FixedPriceInvalid
errors.msg: The provided fixed price is invalid

errors.name: SwitchboardOnDemandError
errors.msg: Switchboard On Demand price derive error

errors.name: ConfidenceIntervalCheckFailed
errors.msg: Confidence interval check failed

errors.name: InvalidGenericData
errors.msg: Invalid generic data

errors.name: NoChainlinkReportData
errors.msg: No valid Chainlink report data found

errors.name: InvalidChainlinkReportData
errors.msg: Invalid Chainlink report data format

errors.name: MostRecentOfInvalidSourceIndices
errors.msg: MostRecentOf config must contain at least one valid source index

errors.name: MostRecentOfInvalidMaxDivergence
errors.msg: Invalid max divergence (bps) for MostRecentOf oracle

errors.name: MostRecentOfInvalidMaxAge
errors.msg: Invalid max age (s) for MostRecentOf oracle

errors.name: MostRecentOfMaxAgeViolated
errors.msg: Max age diff constraint violated for MostRecentOf oracle

errors.name: MostRecentOfMaxDivergenceBpsViolated
errors.msg: Max divergence bps constraint violated for MostRecentOf oracle

errors.name: PythLazerVerifyIxFailed
errors.msg: The invoked pyth lazer verify instruction failed

errors.name: PythLazerInvalidFeedID
errors.msg: Invalid feed id passed in to PythLazer oracle

errors.name: PythLazerInvalidExponent
errors.msg: Invalid exponent passed in to PythLazer oracle

errors.name: PythLazerInvalidConfidenceFactor
errors.msg: Invalid confidence factor passed in to PythLazer oracle

errors.name: PythLazerInvalidMessagePayload
errors.msg: Received an invalid message payload in the PythLazer oracle when refreshing price

errors.name: PythLazerInvalidChannel
errors.msg: Received an invalid channel in the PythLazer payload when refreshing price

errors.name: PythLazerInvalidFeedsLength
errors.msg: Payload should have a single feed in the PythLazer payload when refreshing price

errors.name: PythLazerInvalidFeedId
errors.msg: Invalid feed id in the PythLazer payload when refreshing price

errors.name: PythLazerPriceNotPresent
errors.msg: Property fields in the feed of the PythLazer payload do not contain a price

errors.name: PythLazerBestBidPriceNotPresent
errors.msg: Property fields in the feed of the PythLazer payload do not contain a best bid price

errors.name: PythLazerBestAskPriceNotPresent
errors.msg: Property fields in the feed of the PythLazer payload do not contain a best ask price

errors.name: PythLazerInvalidAskBidPrices
errors.msg: Invalid ask/bid prices provided in the feed of the PythLazer payload

errors.name: ExpectedPriceAccount
errors.msg: Price account expected when updating mapping

errors.name: WrongAccountOwner
errors.msg: Provided account has a different owner than expected

errors.name: CompositeOracleInvalidSourceIndex
errors.msg: Provided source index is invalid

errors.name: CappedFlooredBothCapAndFloorAreNone
errors.msg: Can't set both cap and floor to None for CappedFloored oracle

errors.name: MissingPriceAccount
errors.msg: Missing price account for Oracle Mapping update

errors.name: ChainlinkXPriceNotSuspended
errors.msg: Cannot resume a ChainlinkX price that was not suspended

errors.name: OutsideMarketHours
errors.msg: Price update rejected as outside of market hours

errors.name: PythLazerExponentNotPresent
errors.msg: Property fields in the feed of the PythLazer payload do not contain an exponent

errors.name: PythLazerUnexpectedExponent
errors.msg: The exponent provided in the feed of the PythLazer payload is not the expected one

errors.name: InvalidConversionToEmaTypeForOracleType
errors.msg: Cannot convert oracle type to EMA type

errors.name: TwapEnabledBitmaskConversionFailure
errors.msg: Invalid TWAP enabled bitmask value

errors.name: OperationNotSupported
errors.msg: This operation is not supported

errors.name: TwapSourceIndexNotSet
errors.msg: TWAP source index not set
